rules_text:
Whenever you draw or cache a card, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target land.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap up to one target land you control. It becomes a 3/3 creature with vigilance, hexproof, and haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

was
Each creature you control has all activated abilities of each other creature you control. Those abilities can be activated only once each turn.
GU: This creature phases out.
